full_summary:
# Rotary Chairs Tender Announcement

## Description of the Procurement
Pacific Economic Development Canada is issuing a Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Rotary Chairs. The procurement is issued under PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H, which covers a requirement from the product sub-category Rotary chairs and Rotary stools.

## Requirement Overview
The procurement covers a requirement for the purchase, storage, delivery, and installation of office seating to the following locations by September 30, 2024:

* Gateway Station Tower, Surrey, BC
* 535 Yates Street, Victoria, BC
* 460 Doyle Avenue, Kelowna, BC

## Procurement Details

* **Location**: Various locations across British Columbia, Canada
* **Procurement method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Notice type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Trade agreements in effect**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Evaluation criteria**: Lowest Price

## Eligibility Requirements
To be eligible to bid, suppliers must be pre-qualified and have a Supply Arrangement. Non-SA holders may submit a bid, but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority for evaluation.

## Contract Details
* **Contract duration**: February 19, 2024 - March 31, 2025
* **Expected start date**: February 19, 2024
* **Expected end date**: March 31, 2025

## Contact Information
* **Contact name**: Calvin Lee
* **Contact email**: pacifican.procurement.approvisionnement@prairiescan.gc.ca
* **Contact phone**: (604) 360-0486

## Further Information
The full tender notice and attachment can be found at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31342/rfp-4w005-240183---rotary-chairs---kelowna%2C-surrey%2C-victoria_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31342/rfp-4w005-240183---rotary-chairs---kelowna%2C-surrey%2C-victoria_0.pdf)

The notice of proposed procurement (NPP) for Rotary Chairs is now closed. To find out more information on upcoming tender
